name: Cheesy Pasta
description: Creamy and cheesy pasta that's a crowd-pleaser.
instructions: 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions.
2. In a saucepan, melt butter and add heavy cream.
3. Stir in Parmesan and Cheddar cheese until creamy.
4. Season with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and parsley.
6. Serve hot and garnish with extra cheese and parsley.
